skills.name: Sacred Cannon
skills.description: Charged Cannon.1st Sequence: Single shot.2nd Sequence: Empowered double shot.3rd Sequence: Super-powered triple shot.When Combo Hit Count exceeds 15, character attacks gain 20% Physical DMG.

skills.name: Cluster Bomb
skills.description: Shells explode into additional bomblets, with each of the charge sequences generating 2, 4, and 9 additional bomblets respectively. Each bomblet deals 30% ATK of Physical DMG.
